txt.en: 'Will you come with me to speak with this woman? Let me know when you are ready to depart.'
Talk to Inkanûsh at Vartúlin and go with him to speak with Cúridwan
'Then let us call upon Cúridwan and learn if she has answers to my questions.'
Inkanûsh has many questions to ask of the mysterious woman Cúridwan who dwells near Vartúlin.
'The answers to my questions must wait until we find Cúridwan somewhere within Adagím. I am nothing if I am not patient, [placeholder]. I trust you have not heard otherwise!'
Inkanûsh waits at Vartúlin for you and Glorfindel to go with him to speak with Cúridwan.
Inkanûsh has returned to the Kinta grove of Vartúlin in Imhûlar and wishes to speak with you.
